label.no-api-key-2: Click the button below to add an API key.
label.interval-description: * The data above is based on the current policy of the Gemini 1.5 Flash API.
label.api-key-description-1: * To get a free Gemini API key, you need to create an account on Google AI Studio at
label.api-key-description-3: . Note that the use of the Gemini API is free with restrictions. Check the Google AI Studio documentation for more information.
label.api-key-description-4: * We do not store your API key. It is stored locally in your browser.
error.onImageUpdate: Error updating the image. The API key may be incorrect or have exceeded the usage limit.
